languages.text: {n}Соломон скрещивает руки на груди.{/n} "Наши отношения складывались не самым простым образом, {name}. Но мы прошли через это... или нет?"
{n}Solomorne folds his arms over his chest.{/n} "Our relationship didn't start off smoothly, {name}. But we're past that now... aren't we?"
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон скрещивает руки на груди.{/n} "Наши отношения складывались не самым простым образом, {name}. Но мы прошли через это... или нет?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne verschränkt die Arme vor seiner Brust.{/n} "Unsere Beziehung hatte keinen guten Start, {name}. Aber darüber sind wir mittlerweile hinweg ... oder?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms over his chest.{/n} "Our relationship didn't start off smoothly, {name}. But we're past that now... aren't we?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne verschränkt die Arme vor seiner Brust.{/n} "Unsere Beziehung hatte keinen guten Start, {name}. Aber darüber sind wir mittlerweile hinweg ... oder?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine.{/n} « Notre relation n'a pas commencé sous les meilleurs auspices, {name}, mais nous avons surmonté ces difficultés... n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms over his chest.{/n} "Our relationship didn't start off smoothly, {name}. But we're past that now... aren't we?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine.{/n} « Notre relation n'a pas commencé sous les meilleurs auspices, {name}, mais nous avons surmonté ces difficultés... n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは胸の前で腕を組んだ。{/n}「{name}、私たちの関係は、順調な始まりとは言えませんでしたね。ですが、それはもう乗り越えました…そうですよね？」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms over his chest.{/n} "Our relationship didn't start off smoothly, {name}. But we're past that now... aren't we?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは胸の前で腕を組んだ。{/n}「{name}、私たちの関係は、順調な始まりとは言えませんでしたね。ですが、それはもう乗り越えました…そうですよね？」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne cruza los brazos.{/n} «Nuestra relación no empezó con buen pie, {name}, pero ya hemos superado ese escollo... ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms over his chest.{/n} "Our relationship didn't start off smoothly, {name}. But we're past that now... aren't we?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne cruza los brazos.{/n} «Nuestra relación no empezó con buen pie, {name}, pero ya hemos superado ese escollo... ¿verdad?».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙将双臂交叉在胸前。{/n}“我们之间的关系一开始并不顺利，{name}，但这一切都已经过去了……不是吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms over his chest.{/n} "Our relationship didn't start off smoothly, {name}. But we're past that now... aren't we?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙将双臂交叉在胸前。{/n}“我们之间的关系一开始并不顺利，{name}，但这一切都已经过去了……不是吗？”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, kollarını göğsü üzerinde kavuşturuyor.{/n} "İlişkimiz biraz sert başladı {name} ama o günleri geride bıraktık... Değil mi?"
